title: Producer Keity Wants WHO To Be Her Power Of Attorney?
description:
Producer Keity got into a heated debate with her friends recently over who she should trust with her power of attorney! They think your spouse should have all control, she wants to give the power to her MOM! What do you think? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
